DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study report intraoperative performance postoperative outcome Cionni-modified capsule tension ring implantation eye subluxate lens .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Cionni Ring In-the-bag IOL Implantation Subluxated Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: The introduction endocapsular stabilising device significantly improve management zonular weakness , allow in-the-bag IOL implantation . The Cionni modify capsule tension ring ( M-CTR ) anterior eyelet provide fixation capsular bag without violate integrity . Adult pediatric study show usefulness M-CTR manage zonular weakness . However , prospective study show outcomes follow implantation M-CTR in-the-bag IOL longterm basis . Therefore , investigator decide carry study report intraoperative performance postoperative outcome longterm basis follow M-CTR in-the-bag intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation .
DOC.criteria: Subluxated Lenses Traumatic Nontraumatic etiology Dislocated Lenses
